text: Bruce Arena (born September 21, 1951) is a former American soccer player. He played for Tacoma Tides and the United States Men's national team. Arena graduated from Cornell University in 1973. He most recently served as the head coach and sporting director of the New England Revolution. ==International career statistics== |- |1973||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} == Other websites == * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American association football goalkeepers Category:American soccer coaches Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Cornell University alumni Category:New York Red Bulls managers
title: Bruce Arena
